item.title: Discover Govc: set and sync vCenter permissions
item.description: No longer than a couple of weeks ago I stumbled on this nifty little tool called govc. Sure, I heard of this before, but I did not realize how powerful this tool can be. Until now! So, I decided to write a blog about my specific use-case, Set and sync vCenter permissions with an openLDAP group. What is govc Govc is basicly a wrapper around GO modules for vSphere. To be more specific, it relies on the official VMware govmomi library.
